translation.your_acceptance_rate_represents_the_numb:
Your acceptance rate represents the number of jobs you accepted to send your offer VS the jobs you denied when you are selected by customers.

The higher the rate, it indicates your commitment of using the app. If you keep denying service requests or not respond at all your rate will go down and your account will be suspended.

If you are going to take a break we recommend switching The app to “Vacation mode” from settings.

translation.if_you_are_not_selected_from_customers_d: If you are not selected from customers to send an offer for a particular service, with this section of the app you get a second change to contact the customer and send your offer.
translation.how_do_i_use_the_opportunities_to_get_bu: How do I use the opportunities to get business?
translation.in_opportunities_section_we_will_display: In opportunities section we will display all the requested services that matches with your profile. If you find an interesting opportunity simply tap to read all the details. Once you find an interesting opportunity tap on “I’m interested” and follow the steps to send your offer along with a short message to the client. Remember this is a second chance to try to urge the client to select you because of your competitive prices, quality of work, etc.
translation.is_the_opportunities_a_free_service: Is the Opportunities a free service?
translation.listing_your_services_on_the_app_descr:
Listing your services on the app is generally a free service available to every individual or company, if the customer chooses you, you will be able to send an offer directly for free and communicate using messaging and calls. but if you are not selected, here we give you a second chance to send your offer and this service is not free for some reasons such as:

 - Spamming customers with unlimited offers will distract them and will create uncompetitiveness from non-serious Pros, so this section is made for serious Pros who are willing to offer real services and competitive services.

 - Your profile might not be attractive to customers and might not urge them to choose you so it is your second chance to directly reach our to them with an offer they cannot refuse.
translation.how_do_i_pay_for_an_opportunity: How do I pay for an opportunity?
translation.points_are_the_only_way_to_purchase_desc: Points are the only way to purchase an opportunity, you can buy points from “Points” section.
translation.this_service_gives_you_the_opportunity_d: This service gives you the opportunity to communicate with customers and does not guarantee that you will win it. The choice is up to the customer, we have no authority over it. The ervice fees are not refundable in any way.

translation.to_activate_your_account_descr: To activate your account, you must provide us with copies of your government issued ID (front and back) and your selfie photo taken by your device camera.

translation.why_do_we_need_your_id: Why do we need your ID?
translation.at_tappler_we_prioritize_trust_and_safet: At Tappler, we prioritize trust and safety within our community. To ensure the integrity of our platform and provide a secure environment for all users, we require professionals to verify their accounts through a simple process.
translation.verifying_the_identity_of_professionals_: Verifying the identity of professionals helps us maintain a reliable network of service providers. By confirming their identity with a government-issued ID, we can ensure that users are connecting with genuine individuals who are qualified to offer their expertise.
translation.identity_verification_adds_an_extra_desc: Identity verification adds an extra layer of security to our platform. It helps prevent fraudulent activities and protects both professionals and customers from potential scams or misuse of the platform.
translation.we_understand_the_sensitivity_descr: We understand the sensitivity of personal information and value the privacy of our users. Rest assured, the copies of your ID and the selfie photo you provide during the verification process are solely used for identity confirmation purposes. We adhere to strict privacy policies and do not share this information with customers or any third parties without your explicit consent.
translation.in_some_cases_we_reserve_the_rights: In some cases we reserve the rights to ask you to apparent in person with your ID to verify your identity.

translation.your_business_trade_license_is_on_file: Your Business trade license is on file
translation.if_the_number_of_your_profile_views_desc:
The count of your profile views indicates how much your profile is attractive to customers, here is how to dramatically improve it:

- Carefully choose a high quality profile photo with enough light and simple background.

- Respond faster to service requests you receive from clients or opportunities you purchase, this will rank your profile on top of your competitors and provide you with higher visibility in search results.

- Promote your profile by subscribing to “Featured PRO” service, this will guarantee your profile will show in first pages on top of your competitors.

- Customers love deals and discounts, subscribe to “Motivational Stickers” to attract customers to choose you for a service.

translation.write_a_message_to_the_customer_descr: Write a message to the customer explaining why they should choose you for the service.
translation.how_to_send_a_winning_offer: How to send a winning offer
translation.points_used_in_opportunities_are_reserve:
Points used in opportunities are reserved or deducted as follow:
 - Points are temporary reserved for 3 days or until the job requested date is passed (whichever comes sooner)
 - Points will permanently deducted from your account when the customer chose you or reply back to you.

translation.number_of_times_title: Number of times you've been selected
translation.number_of_times_descr:
It is the number of times customers have chosen you to send your offer for performing a service.
If the “times you have been selected” rate is below 50%, there are ways to improve it by following one of the below methods:
- Improve your profile by adding high quality photos, videos and content. Visit how to build winning profile.
- Add motivating stickers such as “Instant discount” or “Fast Service” This will indeed motivate customers to choose you.
translation.your_ranking_descr:
Your ranking is calculated based on the time you took to Respond to a service request. The percentage represents how much your ranking is better than others.
Longer response time (above 1.5 hours) will affect your ranking and cause you to lose business to someone else. When customers wants service they want it as soon as possible and here is how to improve the response time:
- Enable App notifications and make sure you are always connected to the internet.
- Subscribe to any of the upgrade packages such as Featured Pro or Motivational stickers where you will also receive notification by SMS every time you are selected to quote for a service.
translation.converted_opportunities_descr:
It is the number of times your purchased an opportunity and customers selects you to send your offer.
If this rate is below 50%, it means your offer or profile is not attracting customers. You can improve this by doing one of the following:
- When you send your offer, be realistic with your offer, Do not put very cheap or unrealistic prices. Greet the customer with full respect and send an honest message about how good is your service.
- Subscribe to “Motivational Stickers”, this will motivate customers to choose you to take advantage of your discounts/offers.

translation.do_you_want_to_save_the_changes_to_your_: Do you want to save the changes to your profile?
translation.featured_pro_is_a_premium_descr: Featured Pro is a premium service offered by the app to guarantee the appearance of your profile on top of other Pros when customers search for service.
translation.why_should_i_become_a_featured_pro: Why should I become a featured Pro?
translation.consumer_behavior_studies_descr: Consumer behavior studies have shown that most people who are searching for products or services are most likely to make their selection from the results shown in the first page of search engines or apps which increases the possibility of conversions comparing to those who appear in the following pages.
translation.your_profile_will_appear_descr: Your profile will appear on top of other pros when customers search for services you offered on the app, this would give you an edge of getting selected.
translation.it_is_an_effective_marketing_descr: It is an effective marketing tool, the frequent appearance of your profile will enable you to establish your brand or business name in customers mind.
translation.motivational_stickers_are_marketing_desc: Motivational stickers are marketing tool that is so powerful and influential in persuading customers to purchase your services. This tool is provided only by the Tabler to help Pros to reach out to a larger number of customers and influence them to purchase a service.
translation.discounts_and_other_benefits_descr: Discounts and other benefits are extremely powerful psychological technique, it attract the customers and give them that feeling they will receive a better deal comparing to other Pros. This will most likely lead to customers choosing you so they don’t mess the deal.
translation.in_addition_to_the_stickers_descr: In addition to the stickers, you will be able to add an extra marketing message that will show on your profile page with no extra cost.
translation.it_will_give_your_descr: It will give your profile a different and noticeable look comparing to competing Pros.
translation.20_off_your_service_on_tuesdays_and_wedn: 20% off your service on Tuesdays and Wednesdays
translation.offering_a_discount_and_other_descr: - Offering a discount and other benefits to customers is extremely powerful psychological technique, it attract the customers and give them that feeling they will receive a better deal comparing to other Pros. This will most likely lead to customer to choosing the deal that they don’t want to miss.
translation.it_will_give_your_profile_a_different_de: - It will give your profile a different and noticeable look comparing to competing Pros.
translation.hyphen_in_addition_to_the_stickers_descr: - In addition to the stickers, you will be able to add an extra marketing message or explanation about the offer in your profile page with no extra cost.

translation.read_them_to_know_the_latest_updates: Read them to know the latest updates.

translation.points_are_the_currency_of_the_app_descr: Points are the currency of the app for paying for opportunities where you get a second change to contact the client and send your offer that might lead to win a new business.
translation.buying_points_is_very_easy_descr: Buying points is very easy, you can pay for points using major credit cards, Fawry and digital wallets.
translation.opportunities_are_different_in_price_des: Opportunities are different in price based on service category, you can check the cost from the opportunities section
translation.if_i_spent_points_on_opportunity: If I spent points on opportunity but I never get selected by the client do I get a refund?
translation.we_are_giving_you_a_second_chance_descr: We are giving you a second chance to reach out to clients and it is up to you to convince them to choose you but the points are not refundable and will be deducted permanently from your balance.
translation.no_points_doesnt_expire_descr: No points doesn't expire but if your account got suspended for violating the app terms and conditions you agree to forfeit your rights to claim any refund of your points balance.
translation.you_are_subscribed_to_the_following_serv: You are subscribed to the following services
translation.enter_the_message_that_will_appear_under: Enter the message that will appear under your sticker

translation.please_expect_a_response_as_soon_as_poss: Please expect a response as soon as possible
translation.to_earn_background_checked_sticker_you_m: To earn Background Checked sticker you must provide a “Criminal Records” certificate issued by police to prove your good conduct.
translation.providing_this_document_will_grant_descr: Providing this document will grant you “Background checked” sticker added to your profile, It gives confidence to customers to deal with you.

translation.the_following_documents_are_required_to_: The following documents are required to activate this service
translation.the_file_must_be_in_pdf_format_in_good_q: The file must be in PDF format, in good quality with a maximum size of 10 Mb
translation.we_will_review_the_document_and_if_appro: We will review the document and if approved, your service will be activated.
translation.enter_your_email_address_we_will_send_yo: Enter your email address, we will send you an OTP for verification
translation.you_need_to_activate_the_business_accoun:
You need to activate the business account
by providing copy of the business trade
license from My Documents section.
Continue with the change?
translation.if_you_change_your_account_type_to_indiv: If you change your account type to individual, your business name will no longer appear in search results. Continue with the change?
translation.number_inclusive_of_VAT_this_fee_doesnt: {{number}} EGP inclusive of VAT for one year, this fee doesn’t include the cost paid to authorities to obtain the certificate.
translation.the_certificate_must_be_issued_within_th: The certificate must be issued within the last 30 days
translation.after_we_receive_your_request_descr: After we receive your request, we will check and verify the certificate then add the sticker to your account.
translation.upload_a_photo_of_your_business_location: Upload a photo of your business location
translation.you_can_add_more_details_descr: You can add more details, such as the contact person and additional phone numbers.
translation.our_team_members_will_contact_descr: Our team members will contact you to schedule a visit to your location for verification.
translation.this_process_may_take_business: This process may take {{number1}}-{{number2}} business days
translation.upload_copy_of_your_certificates_or_cour: Upload copy of your certificates or courses
translation.qualification_credentials_are_essential_:
Qualification credentials are essential for
professionals to showcase their expertise and build
trust with potential customers. These credentials
provide tangible proof of skills, experience, and
commitment. When customers see your
qualifications, they are more likely to trust your ability
to deliver high-quality service, influencing their
choice. Highlighting your qualifications differentiates
you from competitors, demonstrates competence,
and increases your chances of winning new business.
In essence, credentials are a powerful marketing tool
that can enhance your reputation and attract more
clients.
